channel.title: golang on KUBEDGE's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in golang on KUBEDGE's Blog

item.title: Creating simple GO server container
item.description: GO is perfectly adapted to microservices since it can build standalone executable.

item.title: Setup your GOLANG environment
item.description: A lot of the opensource projects evolvoving around Kubernetes are written in go. It is very usefull to be able to rebuild so projects using go get or go build.
